channel.title: Timos site on the internet
channel.description: Recent content on Timos site on the internet

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I'm Timo. I'm a Software Engineer, doing software for the cloud, in the cloud. I'm currently with Adobe working as a Senior Software Engineer. I work on backend serices for Adobes Cloud offerings, Creative Cloud and Document Cloud. I contribute to Adobe Cloud Platform, the next level for collaborating with Adobe Products on enterprise scale. I like coding, cutting edge technologies, building scalable architectures, good API design and learning new stuff And I like working with people, I'm good in forming teams and motivating people.
